subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic bronze medalist Lars Grael and Marcelo Jordao overcame a deficit of 30 boat lengths after the first mark and took the lead with an aggressive tack on the final upwind leg to win the second race of the Bacardi Cup Star Class Regatta off Miami. Grael and Jordao held the overall lead with four races to go, 1 point ahead of Miami’s Augie Diaz, the 2003 Yachtsman of the Year, who finished third with Phil Trinter.
